Sentencas: To solve the environmental problems associated with municipal sludge incineration and landfilling, a combined cooling, heating, and power (CCHP) system integrating plasma gasification, solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), gas turbine, supercritical carbon dioxide (S-CO2) cycle, and double-effect absorption refrigeration cycle (ARC) is proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: Additionally, the CO2 generated in the system is captured to reduce the environmental impact.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: Energy, exergy, and sensitivity analyses of the developed system are conducted.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: Key parameters such as the SOFC temperature, SOFC pressure, and fuel utilization rate affecting the system performance are studied.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The results show that net electrical efficiencies of the SOFC and the system are 41.96 % and 50.00 %, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The exergy efficiency and comprehensive energy utilization rate of the system are 47.04 % and 87.59 %, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The system can generate a power of 175.03 kW, cooling of 45.70 kW, and heating of 85.82 kW under the design conditions, accounting for 67.46 %, 21.23 %, and 11.31 % total energy output of system, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The three main sources of exergy destruction of the system are the plasma gasification, SOFC, and supercritical CO2 cycle subsystems, accounting for 36.8 %, 12.2 %, and 10.7 % exergy destruction, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The system performs the best when the SOFC temperature is 910 degrees C and the fuel utilization rate is between 0.85 and 0.90.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Sentencas: The SOFC pressure has little effect on the system performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture

Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of SOFC-CCHP system based on municipal sludge plasma gasification with carbon capture
